description: Found on a quiz long ago.
comments: Suggestion from Rickey Bowers Jr, (math(AT)bitRAKE.com), May 18 2006:a(0) = 5,a(1) = 2 * prime(5),a(2) = (prime(5))^2,a(3) = 2^4 * prime(prime(5)),a(4) = (prime(prime(5)))^(2^4),...a(2n-1) = (2^(n^2)) * prime^n(a(0)),a(2n) = prime^n(a(0))^(2^(n^2)).
author: Anon
